name: Archeoline
description:
I small puzzle game that plays similarly to Picross and Sudoko, inspired by Zachtronics' "Dungeons & Diagrams". My first game ever.

Check the options menu for "How To Play".

You are an archeologist that is preparing artifacts to be properly extracted by digging tunnels. The tunnels have to be dug in a specific way, or else you could trigger a trap or cave-in!

Linux build is untested.

Not recommended to play on mobile.
